00002 /*! _zgematrix+_zhematrix operator */
00003 inline _zgematrix operator+(const _zgematrix& matA, const _zhematrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const _zgematrix&, const _zhematrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.N){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(_zgematrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00013               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00014               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00015               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00016     exit(1);
00017   }
00018 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00019   
00020   for(long i=0; i<matB.N; i++){ for(long j=0; j<matB.N; j++){
00021     matA(i,j)+=matB(i,j);
00022   }}
00023   
00024   matB.destroy();
00025   return matA;
00026 }

00031 {
00032 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00033   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const _zgematrix&, const _zhematrix&)"
00034             << std::endl;
00035 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00036   
00037 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00038   if(matA.N!=matB.N || matA.M!=matB.N){
00039     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(_zgematrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00040               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00041               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00042               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00043     exit(1);
00044   }
00045 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00046   
00047   for(long i=0; i<matB.N; i++){ for(long j=0; j<matB.N; j++){
00048     matA(i,j)-=matB(i,j);
00049   }}
00050   
00051   matB.destroy();
00052   return matA;
00053 }

00056 /*! _zgematrix*_zhematrix operator */
00057 inline _zgematrix operator*(const _zgematrix& matA, const _zhematrix& matB)
00058 {
00059 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00060   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _zgematrix&, const _zhematrix&)"
00061             << std::endl;
00062 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00063   
00064 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00065   if(matA.N!=matB.N){
00066     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(_zgematrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00067               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00068               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00069               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00070     exit(1);
00071   }
00072 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00073   
00074   zgematrix newmat( matA.N, matB.N );
00075   zhemm_( 'R', 'L', matB.N, matA.N, std::complex<double>(1.0,0.0),
00076           matB.Array, matB.N, matA.Array, matA.M, 
00077           std::complex<double>(0.0,0.0), newmat.array, newmat.m );
00078   
00079   matA.destroy();
00080   matB.destroy();
00081   return _(newmat);
00082 }
